title: does blocking people prevent you from being matched with them
body: so some people are horrible but they don't break any specific rules does blocking them prevent you from seeing them or is there another way to do this

replies.body: When you block someone it only means that they cannot communicate with you or send you a friend request, it has no effect on matchmaking. The only real way to avoid being matched with specific people is to keep track of when they're in queue and just queuing at a different time than them, though there's not any supported features that would allow you to do so without adding the person to your friends list.
